thread.title: Solo Leveling Season 2 Sneak Peak Is Coming To American Theaters, Here's How & Where You Can Watch It
thread.title_full: Solo Leveling Season 2 Sneak Peak Is Coming To American Theaters, Here's How & Where You Can Watch It

author: Berserk
title: Solo Leveling Season 2 Sneak Peak Is Coming To American Theaters, Here's How & Where You Can Watch It
text: The gates continue to open to unleash Solo Leveling -ReAwakening- in North American theaters, and lucky fans will get the sneak peek experience. Courtesy of a Crunchyroll press release, Solo Leveling's sneak peek event is coming to cinemas in the United States and Canada on December 6, 2024. This, combined with the release window confirmation of Solo Leveling season 2 in January 2025 and initial announcements of Solo Leveling -ReAwakening-'s Japanese and Korean debut, means the hype is about to build up for North American fans. Solo Leveling season 1 is one of the biggest highlights of 2024, with satisfying developments for its protagonist, Sung Jinwoo, as he quickly gets a second chance from "the System" after dying as humankind's weakest hunter. Given its built-in audience with a loyal manhwa readership, it's unsurprising that the series is rolling out the red carpet for a theatrical debut showcasing its followup. Solo Leveling -ReAwakening- is the perfect way to get excited for the Winter 2025 anime season on top of seeing Jinwoo's growth as the Shadow Monarch. Solo Leveling -ReAwakening- Season 2 Preview Hits North American Theaters on December 6 The Red Gate Opens for Viewers in the United States and Canada Soon As the headliner announcement to open the recent Aniplex Online Fest 2024 stream, Solo Leveling season 2 is getting its special preview event through Solo Leveling -ReAwakening-, a special season 1 recap with the first two episodes of season 2. This means fans will glimpse the Red Gate Arc, where Jinwoo tests the power of his shadows, including Igris, and brings Jinah's friend Han Song-Yi on a training exercise with the White Tiger Guild. Solo Leveling -ReAwakening will stoke fans' excitement for the full January 2025 release of season 2. [Related ](/solo-leveling-true-successor-omniscient-readerand-good-better/) [ I've Read Solo Leveling's TRUE Successor and It's So Good, It's Not Even Close ](/solo-leveling-true-successor-omniscient-readerand-good-better/) Solo Leveling is ubiquitous in the world of manhwa and now anime but another series is so good it could be considered as a better successor. Fans of Solo Leveling already have plenty to be excited about, especially with its sequel, Solo Leveling: Ragnarok's webtoon adaptation , starting its run recently on August 1, 2024. The anime was also a massive success itself, with Solo Leveling season 1 potentially heralding a new generation of anime manhwa adaptations . Though anime adaptations of manhwa have been running for sometime, few have become overwhelming successes quite like Solo Leveling. Given its position among the best and most popular anime of Winter 2024 , it's unsurprising that A-1 Pictures and Aniplex want to keep the momentum up as it proceeds to blaze a trail for other prospective manhwa adaptations. Now that fans are hooked, it's only a matter of time until the December 6, 2024 release of Solo Leveling -ReAwakening- in North American theaters. [ Solo Leveling ](/db/tv-show/solo-leveling/) Your comment has not been saved - stream - rent - buy Not available Not available Not available - stream - rent - buy Not available Not available Not available - stream - rent - buy Not available Not available Not available - stream - rent - buy Not available Not available Not available Based on a webtoon series, Solo Leveling is an action-adventure fantasy anime originally created by Chugong. When Sung Jinwoo is slain in the depths of a high-level dungeon, he is reborn - but this time with a plan. Utilizing a unique program that only he can, Jinwoo levels up remarkably fast - and he intends to use his newfound strength to reach the heart of the dungeon and uncover its secrets. - Cast - Aleks Le , [Justin Briner](/tag/person/justin-briner/), Rebecca Wang , Dani Chambers , Michelle Rojas , Kent Williams - Release Date - January 7, 2024 - Seasons - 1 - Writers - Noboru Kimura - Directors - Shunsuke Nakashige - Creator(s) - Chugong - Where To Watch [Crunchyroll](/tag/crunchyroll/)
